name: Reference - /SAFESEH (Image has Safe Exception Handlers) - Microsoft Docs
x_kb_abstract: When /SAFESEH is specified, the linker will only produce an image if it can also produce a table of the image's safe exception handlers. This table specifies for the operating system which exception handlers are valid for the image.
x_kb_author: Mike Blome, Saisang Cai, Colin Robertson, Mike Jones, NextTurn, Gordon Hogenson
